title: Dispel Evil and Good
content:
Dispel Evil and Good Level 5 Abjuration Spell Abberations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you. You can also Break Enchantments that Charm, Frighten, or Possess allies. 10 turns Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Dispel Evil and Good

Level 5 Abjuration Spell

Abberations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

You can also Break Enchantments that Charm, Frighten, or Possess allies.

Dispel Evil and Good is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dispel Evil and Good is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Dispel Evil and Good Information

Description: Abberations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you. You can also Break Enchantments that Charm, Frighten, or Possess allies. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw:
